mapper.insert: insert into QUESTION(title, description, tag, creator, gmt_create, gmt_modified, view_count, comment_count, like_count) VALUES ( #{title}, #{description}, #{tag}, #{creator}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified}, #{viewCount},#{commentCount}, #{likeCount})
mapper.select: select * from question where CREATOR=#{accountId} limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from question where CREATOR=#{accountId}
